Another relationship drama with an odd twist - actually, lots of odd twists, the least of which is that it involves puppets - is ""Anomalisa."" Filmmaker Charlie Kaufman is the creator of some very strange films, ""Being John Malkovich,"" ""Eternal Sunshine Of The Spotless Mind."" But this may be his oddest yet, an affair between a guy that sees a world where everyone's the same...
